info.name: Core-api
info.description:
This document contains a for documentation for core apis of Aries Sportswear.

---

## Authentication

`Bearer Token for secified apis.`

item.name: users

request.description: Send 6-digits otp to provided email for verification
Register new user with the otp for verification
Login to existing users account
All fields are optional. used to update user details
Delete user and all related data
Add item to users cart
Add all items add in users cart

response.name: Get cart items
response.body:
{
    "message": "Cart fetched successfully",
    "cart": [
        {
            "cart_id": 1,
            "quantity": 5,
            "variant_id": 24,
            "variant_name": "FlexFit Olive Shorts XL",
            "description": "Lightweight and stretchable shorts for intense workouts.",
            "color": "#808000",
            "size": "XL",
            "price": "899.00",
            "stock": 10,
            "product_id": 9,
            "product_name": "FlexFit Performance Shorts",
            "image_path": null
        }
    ]
}

request.description:
To remove an item or reduce its quantity from the cart:

 - To reduce the quantity, send the desired quantity to be removed in the API request.
 - To remove the item completely, send the full quantity currently in the cart.

item.description: All user specific api are over here

item.name: staff

request.description: Login to existing staff members account

item.name: Update logged in staff member details

request.description: Add a staff member. Note only admins and super-admins are allowed to add members
Get details of all staff members. Note can be used by only admins and super-admins

response.name: Get all staff members details

item.name: Get details of a specific member

variable.description: Staff member id of whom you want to get details of.

request.description: get details of a particular staff member. Note can be only used by admins and a super-admins

response.name: Get details of a specific member

variable.description: Staff member id of whom you want to get details of.

item.name: Update details of a specific member

variable.description: Staff member id of whom you want to update details.

request.description: Update name, email or avatar of any specify staff member. Note can be used by admin and super-admins only.

response.name: Update details of a specific member

variable.description: Staff member id of whom you want to update details.
Staff member id of whom you want to update details.

request.description: Delete staff member and all related stuff. Can be used by admins or super-admins only.

variable.description: Staff member id of whom you want to update details.

item.description: all staff related apis are here

request.description: Get all categories and sub-categories available
This single endpoint handles fetching all variants OR filtered variants based on query parameters. e.g., /products?color=blue&limit=20

request.description: Add sub category to a existing category
Update name of a existing sub-category
Get all available tags data. Can be only used by staff members

body.raw:
{
    "name": "FlexFit Performance Shorts",
    "subCategoryId": 14,
    "variants": [
        {
            "name": "FlexFit Black Shorts M",
            "description": "Lightweight and stretchable shorts for intense workouts.",
            "color": "#212121",
            "size": "M",
            "price": 899,
            "stock": 25,
            "is_base": true,
            "tagIds": [
                2
            ]
        },
        {
            "name": "FlexFit Black Shorts L",
            "description": "Lightweight and stretchable shorts for intense workouts.",
            "color": "#212121",
            "size": "L",
            "price": 899,
            "stock": 20,
            "is_base": false,
            "tagIds": [
                2
            ]
        },
        {
            "name": "FlexFit Grey Shorts M",
            "description": "Lightweight and stretchable shorts for intense workouts.",
            "color": "#757575",
            "size": "M",
            "price": 899,
            "stock": 15,
            "is_base": false
        },
        {
            "name": "FlexFit Olive Shorts XL",
            "description": "Lightweight and stretchable shorts for intense workouts.",
            "color": "#808000",
            "size": "XL",
            "price": 899,
            "stock": 10,
            "is_base": false
        }
    ]
}

request.description: Create a new product. Note: This only handles product data, not images. Images are uploaded separately to a variant ID after the product is created.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "FlexFit Performance Shorts",
    "subCategoryId": 14,
    "variants": [
        {
            "name": "FlexFit Black Shorts M",
            "description": "Lightweight and stretchable shorts for intense workouts.",
            "color": "#212121",
            "size": "M",
            "price": 899,
            "stock": 25,
            "is_base": true,
            "tagIds": [
                2
            ]
        },
        {
            "name": "FlexFit Black Shorts L",
            "description": "Lightweight and stretchable shorts for intense workouts.",
            "color": "#212121",
            "size": "L",
            "price": 899,
            "stock": 20,
            "is_base": false,
            "tagIds": [
                2
            ]
        },
        {
            "name": "FlexFit Grey Shorts M",
            "description": "Lightweight and stretchable shorts for intense workouts.",
            "color": "#757575",
            "size": "M",
            "price": 899,
            "stock": 15,
            "is_base": false
        },
        {
            "name": "FlexFit Olive Shorts XL",
            "description": "Lightweight and stretchable shorts for intense workouts.",
            "color": "#808000",
            "size": "XL",
            "price": 899,
            "stock": 10,
            "is_base": false
        }
    ]
}

request.description: Sync tags for a specific variant. This will add/remove tags to match the provided list.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "FlexFit Olive Shorts XL",
  "description": "Lightweight and stretchable shorts for intense workouts.",
  "color": "#808000",
  "size": "XL",
  "price": 899,
  "stock": 10,
  "external_link": null,
  "is_base": false
}

{
  "name": "FlexFit Olive Shorts XL",

  "color": "#808000",

request.description: Upload one or more images (max 5) for a specific variant

Delete Product

request.description: Get specific product review
